snippet: One night after they made three errors, the Mets made two more, but it was a general lack of energy that doomed them in a loss to the Nationals.
abstract: Washington Nationals defeat New York Mets, 5-3.
lead_paragraph: One night after they made three errors, the Mets made two more, but it was a general lack of energy that doomed them in a loss to the Nationals.

headline.seo: Sloppy Again, Mets Lose to Nationals
headline.main: Mets Are Sloppy Once Again, but Lethargy Dooms Them
headline.print_headline: Day After a Sloppy Night, Mets Seem Sluggish in Loss
